resources.string: Welcome to the Heroic Robotics PixelPusher Photon configuration utility.
Are you setting up a new Photon or reconfiguring one you\'ve already set up?

"I need to create a wireless connection to the new Photon. I'm going to attempt to create a WiFi access point with the settings a new Photon expects.\n\nIf youâ€™ve manually set up a wireless connection to the Photon, click skip below."

Please make sure your phone is configured to connect to your existing photon. If you can\'t get this to work, please factory reset your Photon by pressing and holding the button while you plug it into power. Then you should follow the new Photon configuration path.
